item.title: Jubilee - Japanese Breakfast
item.description: Japanese Breakfast is one of my favorite, “new-to-me” artists of the year. Not only did Michelle Zauner, the singer and artist behind the band name, release this fire album in 2021, but also she released a best-selling memoir Crying in H Mart as an ode to her mom who passed away a few years ago. I have not finished this memoir yet, and not because I don’t like it, but rather because it is so emotionally charged that I have to be in the right headspace to be able to handle the depth of Zauner’s grief that comes through in each of her words.
